Author: jl777c#5810
Content: never evaluate alts performance during BTC bull rampage

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: everything is compressed, like a spring

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: as long as BTC is increasing dominance, by DEFINITION, all alt prices in BTC are going down. think about that

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if dominance is going up, then altprices MUST go down

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @CoinKing88 when BTC dominance is back down to 40%, then the good alts will be higher.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is the crypto cycle

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it takes many cycles to separate the good alts from the bad

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and over time, any coin in the top 100 will become worth billions and billions of marketcap as the global financial system is decided to allocate at least some small percentage

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the higher BTC goes, the more expensive it will feel, as it is indeed expensive and the more like bargains the alts are

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this BTC dominance is part of the cycle, it pulls in fiat funds into crypto, then dominance goes down and it flows into alts, dominance goes up, breathes in fiat, down and into alts

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the bull market will be very crazy this time around. those who only experienced bear market will be in for some very surprising days

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if half a trillion flows into BTC at the peak of its dominance, and the dominance drops by one third... that is 150 billion+ that will flow into the top 100

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so during BTC rampage, turn off the charts, dont look at alt prices, it will just make you sad

Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
WAVES 2200 sats, 1.7x KMD, used to be 5x
STRAT 8550 sats,  0.65x KMD, used to be 10x+

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the list goes on an on. KMD has done quite well against the other coins

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: of course out of 10000 alts, you can always find some that are doing crazy big gains
